channel.description: Recent content in player on Blog

item.title: Internet TV and video conversion
item.description: A little while ago I bought an HDTV and was looking for a nice media player and a conversion tool to help me enjoy it. As I already had paid for the TV, I assumed that free software would be nice. Here’s what I found that works for me. The role of the media player or media center was quickly filled by a program called Boxeewhich is generally described as a cross-platform freeware media center and includes features like social networking, lets you view, recommend and rate the videos you watch.
